channel.title: Comments on: Friday Go Forward: Week 61

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: I like IGS well enough. In particular, I love the fact that it actually works well on a Mac. I've played maybe 10 games or so on it and have enjoyed the experience so far. Yes. Ranking takes forever. I don't even know how the ranking system works in fact. I've been 4k? for so long. And then there are ranks like 4k+. The ranking system just bewilders me. But yeah, it's fun if you need a quick opponent. Hope to see you on there sometime!
item.content:encoded:
I like IGS well enough. In particular, I love the fact that it actually works well on a Mac. I’ve played maybe 10 games or so on it and have enjoyed the experience so far.
Yes. Ranking takes forever. I don’t even know how the ranking system works in fact. I’ve been 4k? for so long. And then there are ranks like 4k+. The ranking system just bewilders me. But yeah, it’s fun if you need a quick opponent.
Hope to see you on there sometime!

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: I agree. They seem rather harsh at times, but my goal is to get stronger and not be told that "I'm so strong" or whatever. Hopefully you can participate in YSD in the future as well! I think you would really enjoy it.
item.content:encoded: I agree. They seem rather harsh at times, but my goal is to get stronger and not be told that “I’m so strong” or whatever. Hopefully you can participate in YSD in the future as well! I think you would really enjoy it.

item.title: By: Eyecatcher
item.dc:creator: Eyecatcher
item.description: 18 games, very nice! YunÂ­guseng Dojang! is so great, hopefully i will have time and money to join the league this or next season... But as you mentioned, the reviews can be kind of "radical" ... but that`s great i think... exactly what will help us to growth :)

item.title: By: RisingStar
item.dc:creator: RisingStar
item.description: That's awesome Ben. How do you like IGS and how long have you been playing on it? I've been on it for quite a while but it takes forever to rank up XD Hope you enjoyed the experience :)
item.content:encoded: That’s awesome Ben. How do you like IGS and how long have you been playing on it? I’ve been on it for quite a while but it takes forever to rank up XD Hope you enjoyed the experience ðŸ™‚
